Detailed Description

Description: Loggable specifies an interface classes may inherit to more easily integrate with the LogManager.

Member Function Documentation

virtual std::string Loggable::toString (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Clients should use this interface memeber to provide the logger with a formatted message.
